minions_js

This is a small autonomous agent simulation, intended to show how emergent behaviours can observed when discrete entities follow simple rules.

Minions will try to gather around their leader - the mouse pointer.

Left click to shout at them and scare them away you monster

You will see that minions will try to form little packs with others to feel safe.

The background is a visualisation of the quadtree spatial partitioning algorithm I implemented for collision detection and I thought it looked nice so I left it in.
